price: No quedarán impunes como piensan, porque el registro de los pecadores está en un libro ineludible.
arabic: كَلَّآ إِنَّ كِتَٰبَ ٱلۡفُجَّارِ لَفِي سِجِّينٖ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: kallā inna kitāba al-fujāri lafī sijjīnin
